messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] neighbor's knowledge
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Amy, Hearing more pertinent details does clarify the picture. I realize that you were trying to be discreet, but the post I responded to did not indicate
messages.messageBody:
Dear Amy,

Hearing more pertinent details does clarify the
picture.

I realize that you were trying to be discreet, but the
post I responded to did not indicate an illiterate
mother and captive children.

There are obviously control issues within that family.


About 98% of Americans have televisions in their
homes. At least that's the statistic I've heard often
quoted. That theirs is an environment so cut off from
the rest of the world and even simple children's books
are banned is quite an oddity.

What can I say ... The details paint a grim picture.

Melinda





=====
: D Melinda
